availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. South Carolina native. Married to Mary Elizabeth Holland Gore. Father of William H. Gore, Permelia Gore, Notley D. Gore, James V. Gore, John B. Gore, Nancy Ann Gore, Oliver P. Gore, Mastin O. Gore, Elizabeth R. Gore Gregory, Dennis W. Gore, and Thomas S. Gore. Married to Pembrook McCory Gore in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on January 2, 1845. Father of Maudena Mary Gore, Zachary Taylor Gore, and Alfred Marion Gore. Stepfather of Susan D. McCoy. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1840. Owned one enslaved person in Caldwell County in 1840. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860.
